Name: NetDC Arabic BNSC: Broadcast News Speech Corpus
License: Non Commercial Use - ELRA END USER
Description: The database contains ca. 22.5 hours of broadcast news speech recorded from Radio Orient (France) during a 3-month period between November 2001 and January 2002 (37 broadcast news, including 32 from the 5.55 pm news and 5 from the 10.55 pm news, with about 90 distinct speakers identified)
